articles.title: Oil drops, Brent crude falls below $100 as China lockdowns spark demand fears - CNBC
articles.description: Oil prices declined Monday, following two straight negative weeks, amid fears of a demand slowdown from China, the world's largest oil importer.
articles.content:
Oil prices slid Monday, falling to the lowest level since February and building on two straight weeks of declines as lockdowns in China sparked demand fears.
